articles.description: Several more states on Thursday announced Covid-19 vaccines would be available to more people, news that came as the nation's top infectious disease expert said we might need to inoculate children to reach herd immunity.

articles.author: NBC Bay Area
articles.title: San Mateo County Changes Vaccine Distribution Strategy - NBC Bay Area
articles.description: San Mateo County is changing the way it runs its COVID-19 vaccine sites, starting to think smaller and more local.
articles.content:
San Mateo County is changing the way it runs its COVID-19 vaccine sites, starting to think smaller and more local.
